column6: The LAST DAY of LOKI! As the Marvel Universe dies, there's just time for one last story - the story of the showdown you've been waiting for! It's Loki versus Loki at the very end of all that is - and only one will take a bow when the curtain falls! THAT'S ALL, FOLKS!
column8: | writer:Al Ewing | penciller (cover):Lee Garbett | editor:Wilson Moss
